generations.inputText:
Write an ad for the following product

Tone: comical, informative

Audience: busy parents
generations.text: Introducing the new and improved Baby Bjorn! Now with more features than ever before, the Baby Bjorn is perfect for busy parents on the go. With a new ergonomic design, the Baby Bjorn is more comfortable for both you and your child.

generations.inputText:
Write an ad for the following product

Tone: informative, friendly

Audience: busy parents
generations.text:
Introducing the new and improved Baby Bjorn!

The Baby Bjorn is the perfect carrier for busy parents on the go. It's comfortable for both parents and baby, and it's easy to use. With the Baby Bjorn, you can take your baby with you wherever you go.

The Baby Bjorn is available in three different sizes, so it's perfect for babies of all ages.

generations.inputText:
Write an ad for the following product

Tone: informative, friendly

Audience: busy parents
generations.text: Looking for a way to get your kids to eat their fruits and vegetables? Try our new fruit and vegetable smoothies! They're delicious and nutritious, and your kids will love them.

generations.inputText:
Write an ad for the following product

Tone: informative, friendly

Audience: busy parents
generations.text: Looking for a way to get your kids to eat their vegetables? Try our new vegetable spiralizer! Our vegetable spiralizer is the perfect way to get your kids to eat their vegetables. With our vegetable spiralizer, you can turn vegetables into fun and exciting spiral shapes that your kids will love.
